entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to bring to your attention five new galleries:
1. Nirmala House in Magliano Sabina.
2. Nirmala House in Sant'Angelo Romano.
3. School Trips.
4. Preschool Trips.
5. India Tours.
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

entry.title: Photos Post 32: Third Annual Report
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to report the following progress on uploads to the website Eternal Moments.

A. TOTAL NUMBER OF IMAGES: 33,172.
A1. A total of 2,751 images were uploaded since the second annual report on 2023-0312, which means a daily average of 7.5163 images per day in the last year.
A2. A total of 8,625 images were uploaded since the first annual report on 2022-0312, which means a daily average of 11.7989 images per day in the last 2 years.
A3. The XYZ Unknown Collection has 1,669 images which represents 5.0313% of the total.
A4. Percentage of the targeted 5 million images: 0.66344%.

B. TOTAL NUMBER OF PHOTOS: 24,892.
B1. A total of 1,678 Photos were uploaded since the second annual report on 2023-0312, which means a daily average of 4.5846 Photos per day in the last year.
B2. A total of 3,828 Photos were uploaded since the first annual report on 2022-0312, which means a daily average of 5.2366 Photos per day in the last 2 years.
B3. The XYZ Unknown Collection has 1,432 Photos which represents 5.7528% of the total.

C. TOTAL NUMBER OF PHOTOS MOMENTS OF JOY: 8,280.
C1. A total of 1,073 photos Moments of Joy were uploaded since the second annual report on 2023-0312, which means a daily average of 2.9316 photos Moments of Joy per day in the last year.
C2. A total of 4,797 photos Moments of Joy were uploaded since the second annual report on 2022-0312, which means a daily average of 6.5622 photos Moments of Joy per day in the last 2 years.
C3. The XYZ Unknown Collection has 237 photos Moments of Joy which represents 2.8623% of the total.

D. TOTAL NUMBER OF NAMED COLLECTIONS: 34 (cf. 26 on 2023-0312 and 21 on 2022-0312).

E. TOTAL NUMBER OF GALLERIES IN THE CHRONOLOGY FOLDER: 113.

F. TOTAL NUMBER OF COUNTRIES: 62 (including TBD and 19 countries with no Photos).

G. TOTAL NUMBER OF EMPTY GALLERIES OF COUNTRIES: 154 (including 26 galleries from the 19 countries with no Photos).

H. TOTAL NUMBER OF GALLERIES OF PERMANENT DISPLAYS FOLDER: 67.

I. TOTAL NUMBER OF GALLERIES OF MOMENTS OF JOY DISPLAYS FOLDER: 17.

J. LOWER ESTIMATE OF IMAGES STILL TO BE UPLOADED: 30,000.

We thank you in advance for your understanding, contributions, help, support, and feedback. Please write to us at sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam

A total of 4,797 photos Moments of Joy were uploaded since the second annual report on 2022-0312, which means a daily average of 6.5622 photos Moments of Joy per day in the last 2 years. C3. The XYZ Unknown Collection has 237 photos Moments of Joy which represents 2.8623% of the total. D. TOTAL NUMBER OF NAMED COLLECTIONS: 34 (cf. 26 on 2023-0312 and 21 on 2022-0312). E. entry.title: Photos Post 31: Updates (Moments of Jos Displays Galleries)

link.title: Photos Post 31: Updates (Moments of Jos Displays Galleries)

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We would like to bring to your attention that the Moments of Joy Displays galleries are up to date. Grouped chronologically, they form 17 galleries of the folder Moments of Joy Displays.
Please keep in mind that, as the CCT database is monthly organized, in due time some of these galleries will be divided into 2 or more galleries.
Please kindly share the news and the folder's link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam

entry.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, February 2024

link.title: Photos Post 15: Monthly Pūjās Updates, February 2024

entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

This month 32 new Photos were uploaded to 3 Pūjas as follows (3 high resolutions and 29 medium resolutions).
(i) 1991-0818 Śhrī Gaṇeśha Pūjā: 2 high resolution and 2 medium resolutions uploaded, link Czech Republic 1991.
(ii) 2000-0507 Sahasrāra Pūjā: 1 high resolution uploaded, link Italy 2000.
(iii) 2005-0828 Śhrī Kṛiṣhṇa Pūjā: 27 low resolutions uploaded, link U.S.A. 2005-08.
[Note: the 1991-0818 Photos were added just on 2024-0225.]
Please kindly share the news and the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
